summary: Completed testing of Reset Client PIN feature - All tests passed. Backend API (POST /api/admin/clients/:clientKey/reset-pin) works correctly with proper status codes (200/400/404). Frontend has Reset PIN button (üîê) in client list with correct resetClientPin function.
critical_code_review_comments: WhatsApp integration is MOCKED/NOT CONNECTED - API returns success with warning and newPin when WhatsApp fails to send message
PIN module (src/ai_agent_v1/pin.js) correctly generates 6-digit cryptographically secure PINs using SHA-256 hashing
test_credentials: Authentication is disabled - all requests go through as admin
seed_data_creation: Used existing test clients: e5ee4774-548b-45d8-8bda-6bdf59162101 (has phone), 7ca9ff9d-6c56-406b-9481-9f64ac4b5492 (no phone)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Reset PIN feature fully implemented and tested. WhatsApp is not connected in test environment so API returns warning with newPin. Test clients exist in /app/data/registered_clients.json. Server runs on port 3050 (not 3000 as mentioned in request - check .env PORT=3050).
